fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A piece about Pope Francis referred to the “Congregation for the Defence of the Faith, or CDF”. That should have been the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith (The war against Pope Francis, 28 October, page 33). • An article (Meet your long lost relative: scientists find new species of orangutan, 3 November, page 7) was accompanied by images of the eight great ape species. Or so it should have been. One of them was a subspecies: the western lowland gorilla (Gorilla gorilla gorilla). It should have been the western gorilla (Gorilla gorilla). • Homophone corner: “Link’s plans were intended to put a break on this growth” (Shake-up could close at least 10,000 free cash machines, 2 November, page 4).
